sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Container, Typography, Box, TextField, Button, Paper, Grid, Alert, Divider, } from "@mui/material"; import { Email, Phone, LocationOn, AccessTime, } from "@mui/icons-material"; const ContactPage = () => { const [form, setForm] = useState({ name: "", email: "", subject: "", message: "", }); const [submitted, setSubmitted] = useState(false); const handleChange = (e) => { setForm({ ...form, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // Here you would typically send the form data to your backend console.log("Contact form submitted:", form); setSubmitted(true); setForm({ name: "", email: "", subject: "", message: "" }); }; return ( Contact Us We'd love to hear from you. Send us a message and we'll respond as soon as possible. {/* Contact Form */} Send us a Message {submitted && ( Thank you for your message! We'll get back to you soon. )} {/* Contact Information */} Get in Touch Email support@kindneighbour.com Phone +1 (555) 123-4567 Address 123 Community St
City, State 12345 Business Hours Monday - Friday: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM
Saturday: 10:00 AM - 4:00 PM
Sunday: Closed ); }; export default ContactPage;
